meanings.definition: The quality or state of being practical.
meanings.sent1: Her practicabilities in problem-solving impressed her boss.
meanings.sent2: The practicabilities of the new invention made it a success.
meanings.sent3: His lack of practicabilities in cooking led to a burnt dinner.
meanings.sent4: The practicabilities of the plan shone through in its flawless execution.
meanings.sent5: She demonstrated her practicabilities by efficiently organizing the event.

meanings.definition: The practicality or feasibility of something.
meanings.sent1: The practicabilities of the project were questioned by the team.
meanings.sent2: Considering the practicabilities, they decided to go with a simpler design.
meanings.sent3: The lack of practicabilities in his idea made it seem like a fantasy.
meanings.sent4: The practicabilities of the proposal were evident in its detailed budget.
meanings.sent5: She evaluated the practicabilities of the plan before presenting it to the committee.
